Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Card>
          • CardList
            • Field
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Card>, java.util.Collection<Card>, java.util.List<Card>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public final class Field
extends CardList
    This class is the representation of one player's field. It contains all cards on field and methods needed for field processes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(Card card)
        This method adds a card to the field if there is space left on field.
        Specified by:
        add in interface java.util.Collection<Card>
        Specified by:
        add in interface java.util.List<Card>
        Overrides:
        add in class java.util.ArrayList<Card>
        Parameters:
        card - the card to be added
        Returns:
        true if the card is successfully added, false if there is no space for the card
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card is not a valid type of card to be on the field (only Follower and Amulet are allowed to be on the field)

        public boolean hasCountdownAmulet()

      • hasSwordTraitFollower

        public boolean hasSwordTraitFollower(Trait.SwordCraftTrait targetTrait)
        Checks if there is any follower with specified swordcraft trait
        Parameters:
        targetTrait - the trait to be checked
        Returns:
        true if there is follower with the given trait, false otherwise
        See Also:

      • hasTargetableFollower

        public boolean hasTargetableFollower()

        See Also:
